text:
e="preserve">María del Carmen Leyte Coello (born 3 December 1953) is a Spanish doctor and politician. She was born in Vigo. She is a member of the People's Party. She has served as a member of the Senate since 2008 representing the province of Ourense. She also was mayor of Cartelle between 1991 and 2017.
On 12 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Leyte had tested positive to COVID-19.
